dfs0001.message: Failed to refresh a JWT (JSON Web Token) that's used to call the connector service. Another refresh will be attempted in 10 minutes.

dfs0002.message: We can't export the flow as a BAR file because it contains the following unsupported action or toolbox nodes: {0}
dfs0002.action: Remove the listed nodes from the flow and export it again. Review https://ibm.biz/acdesignerflow-ace in the App Connect documentation for details about the supported components in a flow.
dfs0002.detail: Not all actions or toolbox utilities are supported when running a flow in an integration server.

dfs0003.message: We can't export the flow as a BAR file because it appears to be incomplete.
dfs0003.action: Make sure that the flow can be started successfully and export it again.
dfs0003.detail: Only completed flows can be successfully exported and run.

dfs0004.message: A connection was established via the {0} "{1}" account on premises.

dfs0005.message: A connection was established via the {0} "{1}" account in IBM App Connect on IBM Cloud.

dfs0006.message: We can't connect to "{0}" because a local account isn't available.
dfs0006.action: Run the flow in an environment where connections to IBM App Connect on IBM Cloud are enabled.
dfs0006.detail: Not all accounts are available when running locally.

dfs0007.message: No local accounts are configured for "{0}".
dfs0007.action: Create a secret that stores the account connection details for "{0}".
dfs0007.detail: A secret containing connection details must be configured when using a connector that is running locally.
